div.div: A Public Charter School Serving Grades K-12

img.div:
Brooks Academy
of Science and
Engineering

div.p:
Brooks Academy students will be self-motivated, competent, life-long learners, and prepared to thrive throughout their
lives. Brooks Academy will ensure every student success at the college preparatory level of instruction by virtue of its
small size; commitment to personalizing each student's program and pace of study; the high competency reform oriented
teaching staff this innovative school of choice will attract; and strong partnerships with businesses, universities, and other
resources in the community.

td.br: Brooks Academies of Texas Students. Uses Innovative, Live Online Learning During COVID-19 School Closures

td.a: Brooks Academies Launches LIVE Learning Platform

img.br: Brooks Academies of Texas launches LIVE digital classrooms for all campuses in response to mandated school closures due to Coronavirus.

td.br: We want to thank all students, parents and teachers for the hard work, dedication and spirit of cooperation as we get accustomed to distance learning. Our goal is to reinforce the skills that students have learned this year and start introducing the new concepts they should master by the end of May. So parents will see a mix of review and new work. While we want to make sure no child falls behind or experiences a learning gap when we return to in-person classes, we do not want to overwhelm families and students during this challenging time.

td.a: Did you know- all Brooks staff members are receiving new "Stop the Bleed" and Epilepsy/Seizure Training?

img.alt: Did you know- all Brooks staff members are receiving new "Stop the Bleed" and Epilepsy/Seizure Training?

td.a: Brooks Academies High School Students Participate in Texas Youth Preparedness Camp
td.br: High School students from Brooks Academies are among the 100 youth from across Texas that attended the Texas Youth Preparedness Camp, a week-long camp that prepares youth for a crisis with extensive training.

div.style: color: rgb(70, 70, 70); font-family: Mada, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: rgb(241, 245, 248);
div.strong:
Hello!
Thanks for stopping on our page! We hope you have had a chance to see the incredible LIVE Virtual Learning videos highlighting that over 3,500 of our students have been engaged in during this COVID-19 crisis and school closure.

div.style: color: rgb(70, 70, 70); font-family: Mada, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: rgb(241, 245, 248);
color: rgb(70, 70, 70); font-family: Mada, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: rgb(241, 245, 248);
div.strong: We would love to opportunity to give you a brief virtual tour of our campus with our school leader so that you can learn more about our school and have the opportunity of having your student join our LIVE learning classrooms as we continue to engage the students of San Antonio.

div.style: color: rgb(70, 70, 70); font-family: Mada, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: rgb(241, 245, 248);

div.strong: Click HERE for more information and to sign up for a LIVE Virtual Tour of our campus!
